summary.description:
a Survey to Identify Core Topics and Potential Inter-Program Areas of Collaboration.

Society for Imaging Informatics in Medicine.

SIIM is a professional organization at the nexus of medical imaging informatics and healthcare technologies.

SIIM provides an unparalleled opportunity to not only hear from the best, brightest and most forward thinkers in imaging space but talk to them face to face in a collegial setting.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'curriculum', 'Imaging Informatics Fellowship Curriculum', 'sub-topics', 'inter-program'
summary.name: SIIM
